Name: Blue Moon Wine
Description: Sophia's hand-crafted wine from Blue Moon Vineyard.

DescriptionLocalization.de: Sophias handgefertigter Wein von Blue Moon Vineyard.
DescriptionLocalization.es: Vino artesanal de Sophia de Blue Moon Vineyard.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Le vin artisanal de Sophia de Blue Moon Vineyard.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Sophia kézzel készített bora a Blue Moon Vineyardból.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Il vino fatto a mano di Sophia da Blue Moon Vineyard.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ソフィアのブルームーンヴィンヤードの手作りワイン。
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 블루 문 포도밭에서 소피아의 손으로 만들어진 와인.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: O vinho artesanal de Sophia da Blue Moon Vineyard.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Вино ручной работы Софии с виноградника Голубой Луны.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Sophia'nın Blue Moon Vineyard'dan el işi şarabı.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 索菲亚从蓝月亮葡萄园手工酒。
